places.name: Awhum Waterfall & Cave
places.address: Amaugwe village, Awhum town, Udi Local Government Area, Enugu State, Nigeria
places.description: A stunning 30-meter-high waterfall flowing from a granite rock, known for its warm waters and spiritual significance.

places.name: Ngwo Pine Forest & Cave
places.description: A serene pine forest with a limestone cave and a waterfall. The cave is considered sacred by the Igbo people.

places.address: Nike Lake Road, Abakpa Nike, P.M.B, Enugu, Enugu, 400103
places.description: A tranquil resort on the banks of Nike Lake, offering breathtaking views, boating, and relaxation.

places.name: Enugu Literary Society
places.address: 22 Upper North Road 10 Trans Ekulu, Enugu, Enugu
places.description: A hub for literary activities, book readings, and discussions promoting Igbo culture and literature.

places.name: Centre for Memories
places.address: 2 Awgu Street, Off Umuoji Street, Independence Layout, Enugu, Enugu State, Nigeria
places.description: A museum dedicated to preserving Igbo history and culture, featuring exhibitions and documentaries.

places.name: Ezeagu Tourist Complex
